attributes.action: MPs who have profited from shares attributed to C19 must donate their earnings..
attributes.additional_details:
Taxpayers need answers.

With proof of contacts being awarded to favoured friends and relatives and having early knowledge of investment opportunities, MP's and their spouses must seize this opportunity to use their good will and donate earnings from shares etc in any company associated with and who have profited from the Covid 19 pandemic.

It is our money that has been spent to keep the nation standing. With evidence of so much of it being wasted it is now time to give back.

Give back better.
attributes.background: All MP's and their spouses who have profited from shares attributed to the Covid 19 pandemic must donate their earnings back to the general public as contributions for use in areas such as the recovery of the UK, health and social care/ The NHS and this absolute con of a price hike.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual MPs.
